select m.mem_name,f.mfile_upload,a.* from zipcok_member m,member_file f, (select * from coach_regist c,coach_category g where c.coach_mem_id = g.cate_mem_id)a where m.mem_id=a.coach_mem_id and m.mem_id=mfile_mem_id and mfile_key='코치' and a.cate_name='요가'

select * from (select rownum as rnum, m.mem_name,f.mfile_upload,a.* from zipcok_member m,member_file f, (select * from coach_regist c,coach_category g where c.coach_mem_id = g.cate_mem_id)a where a.coach_floc
like '%%' like '%${location}%'
and a.coach_ex_type
like '%%' = '${extype}'
and a.cate_name
like '%%' like '%${category}%'
and m.mem_id=a.coach_mem_id and m.mem_id=mfile_mem_id and mfile_key='코치' )b where rnum >= #{start} and rnum <= #{end}

select count(*) from zipcok_member m,member_file f, (select * from coach_regist c,coach_category g where c.coach_mem_id = g.cate_mem_id)a where a.coach_floc
like '%%' like '%${location}%'
and a.coach_ex_type
like '%%' = '${extype}'

and m.mem_id=a.coach_mem_id and m.mem_id=mfile_mem_id and mfile_key='코치'
